skeet.tools

My personal collection of 100+ tools and resources for Bluesky. The “featured” section is what I like and/or use the most, they are not sponsors.

Featured Tools

  • Alt Text Rating Tool: How consistly do you use alt text?
  • Skeet Reviewer: Use the KonMari method to sort through your old posts
  • Graze: No-Code Feed Creator
  • pdsls.dev: Browse AtProto repositories
  • Frontpage: Decentralized Link Aggregator
  • Blueview: Insights and Analytics
  • Gentle Unfollow
  • pinksea.art: oekaki (doodle) on the ATprotocol
  • Network Analyzer
  • SkyKit: Bluesky Analytics
  • ClearSky: Transparent Block and List Analytics
  • US Politics Labeler
  • Final words: Glimpses of deleted posts
  • Pronouns Labeler
